title: Sabre Six : File 51
description: Michael Fox an ex-SAS soldier now works as a mercenary, he meets an old friend from the Regiment who asks him to do him a favour. Before he knows it, Michael Fox is suddenly deep in the governments pocket and working for British Intelligence Agency, MI5.Starting off in a Paris train station, Michael's life takes an unexpected turn for the worst, turning his whole life upside down.The target is Ryan Killeen, an ex-IRA king-pin who now trades guns for the Taliban.Endorsed by Phil Campion Author of 'Born Fearless' "Fantastic Debut Novel, absolute good read."
author: Jamie Fineran
